snippet.title: TEPPEN Core Pack Preview
snippet.description:
Explore TEPPEN's Core Pack, a menagerie of creatures and characters from classic Capcom titles that will either guide you to victory, or punish you in defeat.

Download for free now on iOS and Android:
https://gat.onelink.me/NitF/TeppenYouTube

From Capcom and GungHo Online Entertainment comes a unique collaboration to shake up the card game genre, TEPPEN. Combining Capcom icons, fast-paced gameplay, and real-time strategy, TEPPEN is the Ultimate Card Battle. Travel to the Land of Illusion in an original story, battle with friends, or rise to the top in one-on-one fights for complete dominance in ranked matches.

Official Site: https://teppenthegame.com
Twitch: https://twitch.tv/playteppen
Twitter: https://twitter.com/playteppen
Facebook: https://facebook.com/playteppen
